website_summaries.verdict: Solid and sleek, this console table enhances minimalist decor and adds some extra display space.
pros: Functional as a desk or vanity as well as a console table
Simple design lets it blend with many styles
cons: Narrow size may require wall anchors if you think it might get bumped often

customer_reviews.title: ALMOST PERFECT!
customer_reviews.text: I looooooved this! Great price, sturdy, it took me about an hour to assemble I use this for my vanity it was a bit short but I bought 4 inch clear bed risers and I just love it now! It doesn't come with a droor but it's ok I was planning on spending triple the amount of the cost of this one on an ikea one I'm so glad I didn't lol
customer_reviews.author: Alexia Astorga

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love my desk. I made a vanity out of this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great vanity table with slight alterations
customer_reviews.text: A little short for a vanity table but with a slight alteration it is perfect. I found silver votive candle holders at the dollar store and used liquid nails to attach. Added decorative knobs ($7) to add some interest and it's perfect! I took off one star because we had trouble assembling because holes were not aligned and two locknuts were stripped.
customer_reviews.author: bb148

customer_reviews.title: In love!!
customer_reviews.text: In love!!! Exactly what I was Looking for. I added Mirrored faux drawer pulls...I wish It had an actual drawer but otherwise it’s fantastic. Easy to put together as well.
customer_reviews.author: Mj

customer_reviews.title: I really love this. It feels kind of cheap but so ...
customer_reviews.text: I really love this. It feels kind of cheap but so far it's very sturdy and cleaning it has been easy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DO. NOT. BUY. I’m so dead serious.
customer_reviews.text: I’m only putting one star because I have to put at least one star. This table is a piece of crap. It did not come with instructions or the necessary screws. It broke within minutes of trying to put it together and this brand doesn’t seem to have a support email. So I’ll have to call. I only hope I can get my refund because this is way too much money to spend on something that I can’t even use now. I am beyond disappointed. I wouldn’t have even written this review if they had a support email because I would have given the benefit of the doubt that they would try to fix this first. My email is kaitlynsims08@gmail.com
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn Sims

customer_reviews.title: Misdrilled or prefab holes not a good fit.  Okay for light use.
customer_reviews.text: 5 main pieces, cams and pins to secure, 3 hours later... the top will not fully attach. I used to assemble cabinets with a cam and pin system, Ikea furniture doesn't scare me... this just never came together. Definitely recommend working with a partner on this, but it shouldn't be required. Great color, looks like the pictures (espresso), great style, love the thicker panel design. My only complaint is the assembly. Should have been 30 min max for someone with my experience. And it's still not together.
customer_reviews.author: elomenopede

customer_reviews.title: Poorly constructed with substandard materials
customer_reviews.text: Really needed this item to finish the decor I was putting together. The item arrived and several things were wrong. The hardware was a very soft metal and bent easily but worse yet a corner was chipped and a hole in the center of the top piece. The box was not damaged and the hole revealed an almost paper thin Veneers. I put it together and hid the hole but thought it’s probably best just to get it replaced. I needed it but it’s very heavy and I know packing it up and shipping back will be a hassle.
customer_reviews.author: AeroEng

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item for my entry way. I was going to buy from Ikea but since Amazon Prime enjoys free shipping, so I decided to order one from Amazon. The order arrived fast and it was well packaged. However, when I started installing the item, the instruction was very unclear. This was supposed to be an easily assembled item but because of how it was designed, it took me a long time to put it together. The holes and screws were poorly designed. The finished product looks cheap and quality is poor. Very disappointed. Will not buy from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: CWC

customer_reviews.title: Good except for one flaw
customer_reviews.text: All went well until it came time to insert the 4 dowels during the final stage of assembly, They were too big for the holes so had to assemble without them. Very poor QA to do that, and so sorry this flaw was not solvable. The table is way too bulky and heavy to un-assemble and return, or leave partly finished in the hopes of getting replacement dowels, so went ahead without them. IKEA provides dowels that actually fit. So should this company.
customer_reviews.author: Diane A. Curran

customer_reviews.title: Easy, cute, and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: So easy! See my photo for more explanation. Literally, this only involves four pieces of wood and a few pieces of hardware! Mine came out very sturdy! Advise to make it as sturdy as possible: take a few extra seconds to make sure the wood pieces are flushed when putting in the hardware and make sure the hardware is straight when tightening. I love this! My final product picture has additional contact paper that I added separately on the table face.
customer_reviews.author: Doria Candors

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: We put this together in 30 mins. Table surprised me- for the low price it is decent. I ordered expresso and it's lovely. I am using it as a sofa table.
customer_reviews.author: K. Hermansen

customer_reviews.title: Simple but sturdy and good quality
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to put together and for the deal I bought it for it was a great price. The quality looks good, but is your standard laminate pressboard so it isn't extremely fancy. It's a bit smaller than expected, but it does the job. If you're looking for an easy to assemble piece of furniture this is a great option.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah G

customer_reviews.title: This is a great vanity for the price and was exactly what I ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great vanity for the price and was exactly what I was looking for. I often change my decor and didn't want to spend too much as I may change my mind again next year. lol. Super easy to assemble and looks great. My one complaint would be that it is pretty short for a vanity. I popped over to the dollar store, grabbed some candle votives, hot glued them to the bottom ...and it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Temra

customer_reviews.title: It's good as a budget vanity. Perfect size if you are short like me (5'2")
customer_reviews.text: I put this in my walk in wardrobe. It's the perfect size. I'm using a storage ottoman as the stool. Really great if you are on a budget. I kind of had an illusion that there was a panel of wood underneath the desk top that could serve as a storage compartment and that the front lip/panel of wood could be used as the lid and that I could just get some hinges and then it would be perfect as a little concealed storage tray but alas it was an illusion. I have resorted to storing things on my desk top however am still looking in to installing a wooden panel underneath to get that extra storage etc.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: crap.  an inconvenient piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: another I should have returned after fighting with it for 2 hours. I am able to put together most anything - this one is poorly made. one of the 'bolts' was bent in its package, another came right out of the "wood" and left a gaping hole. finally, after 1 12 hours of sheer frustrations, used hammer and screws to make it stand. don't waste your time or money on this piece of junk. if you do - make sure to get matching duct tape and 12 oz of 'wood glue' and brackets.
customer_reviews.author: beth bartlett

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I’m using the table as a vanity table and for the price it’s worth it. It was easy to assemble but the screws were labeled wrong. The glue they give to glue the wood dowels down is cheap glue and I didn’t understand the purpose of it. I just used nail glue to glue those pieces down. Definitely be gentle when screwing everything in or you’ll mess it up. I’m 5’3 and it’s a pretty decent height for me but if you’re taller definitely buy some kind of like raiser or height extender if you want it taller. I love the marble design! I wish it had a drawer though but other than that I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Brionna Edelen

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Study Table
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a table to place in the 2nd bedroom as an area for meditation. I wanted it red and needed it to be affordable. I searched for weeks trying to find something and always my trusty Amazon friend comes to my rescue! This table is elegant and very sturdy. I am still getting the space put together but if you are looking for a nice side table or a focus table or anything that is easy to put together and yet sturdy and affordable then you found it. Very Very Happy
customer_reviews.author: Just Me

customer_reviews.title: I'm glad It's spacious enough to store all my makeup
customer_reviews.text: This fit perfectly in my small bedroom. I'm glad It's spacious enough to store all my makeup. The instructions were pretty vague but assembling it wasn't too hard. Took me about 30 mins to assemble. Mine didn't come scratched or broken it was actually very well packaged! Would definitely purchase another one for my dining room area.
customer_reviews.author: Maribel Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, sturdy, and great for small spaces
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our tiny bedroom to put a TV on at the foot of our bed. The narrowness is perfect to hold a TV and perfect for our small room. PROS Very modern and clean looking Very easy to put together Looks more expensive than it is Very reasonably priced Very sturdy Beautiful color of wood Elegant CONS The front side is way more beautiful than the backside, but shouldn't be a problem if that backside is against a wall I'm probably going to get another one for behind the couch. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlin

customer_reviews.title: instructions
customer_reviews.text: I gave the instructions a 4 star instead of 5 because they list the pieces as A,B,C,D,E when the sections are labeled on a sticker as 1,2,3,4,5. also ignore the first page at the bottom in the instructions b/c it appears confusing. turn the page and then it is easy to understand. it didn't take long to put together and it turns out really nice for such a great price!
customer_reviews.author: theresa b

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I am not very good when it comes to assembling but I put this together with no problem. Very easy to assemble. Cute and looks great in my bonus room/home office. I’m thinking about buying a second one.
customer_reviews.author: Keosha L Lipsey

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: I am actually using this next to my desk, I have a small office and this fits great against the wall and provides a place for my printer and all my chargeable gadgets. It works well with my dark desk and it is well made and was easy to move. So far it is holding about 40 pounds of stuff and is real sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth L. Willitts

customer_reviews.title: Love it so much!
customer_reviews.text: This desk is perfect. Bought it to set up as a makeup vanity as I have a lighted mirror on the way. I may put a piece of plexy glass on the top to protect as I don’t see liquid spilling on it going well. It was so easy to put together and it looks great and it’s a nice size. It’s a little short but that doesn’t bother me as I didn’t want anything huge!
customer_reviews.author: candace labuda

customer_reviews.title: Price reflects product
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy table but looks cheap when assembled and in hallway especially compared with a different console in a different room. Came with few chips but in places where not too noticeable. I have white sharpie pen to color spot! It's price reflects product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Be careful with the instructions - Overall Decent
customer_reviews.text: This isn't the hardest thing to put together but it can get confused so I suggest reading the instructions carefully and not trying to bolt things together until you have all the pieces out. Overall it's decent and does what I need it to do for now - I 'm using it as a vanity until I'm able to get a better or more sturdy desk. My only major con is how short the legs are, I read about some people putting bed raisers or so on the bottom to elevate it and I'm considering do so bc it is really short. Other than that it gets the job done for noe
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!  I am glad that I got it!
customer_reviews.text: I needed an inexpensive table to hold some stuff, and did not want to pay a lot, and needed fast and easy. This fits that bill nicely. I would love a color other than the so-called Ebony. But, other than that, it is a nice little side table. I have a fan and book rack on mine, and it sits nicely on the side of my TV room. Was fast and easy to assemble by myself. Though, You do need to be patient when doing it alone. It would be far easier to assemble with 2-people.
customer_reviews.author: Roger K. Mukai

customer_reviews.title: Good buy.  I like it a lot.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice piece of furniture. I got the espresso color and it is a completely different color than the display picture shows on the listing. The listing shows it more grey-ish, which is what I wanted, but it’s definitely a dark brown espresso color. It seems sturdy, easy to put together and took me about 30 minutes start to finish while I was watching a movie. The box was very damaged when it arrived but the contents were in fine condition.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Neal

customer_reviews.title: Happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: It is working out well. Easy to put together, I did it alone. Yay...girl power! One side didn't quite line up perfectly so I ended up covering the tan colored area that showed with a black sharpie. (It didn't affect the sturdiness fortunately.) I'm pleased with the purchase especially the price.
customer_reviews.author: Realiznthat

customer_reviews.title: Love it ! Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Yesss! Love this desk I use it as a vanity! Works great for cheap! Compared to other vanities. I added a white mirror and looks super cute. Only problem is that its white so you would have to be careful about dirtying it. Recommend putting a glass on top. I brought this to college with me. My dad was able to take it apart for the car ride and build it again without a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Mgee

customer_reviews.title: Decent purchase. Not perfect but pretty.
customer_reviews.text: My console had a dent in the corner of the table top but I was able to put it towards the back where it will be against the wall. I have to knock off a star for that. Other than that, it’s beautiful. This is my 2nd purchase. The first in white for my office and the 2nd in the dark grey. The grey is so much more elegant. Both are nice though.
customer_reviews.author: AmyRick

customer_reviews.title: Resolved my issues quickly and amazing customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I received my order rather quickly but when it arrived it was damaged. I contacted Convenience Concepts directly that night and they were closed but they responded to me the next morning! Super fast. They were able to send me replacement parts that arrived the next week! I’m super happy with this item. It looks great, easy to put together, service was amazing and it’s a great deal for the price. Would definitely purchase from the company again.
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Serves It's Purpose in my hallway, would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Nice table and works well for what I wanted it for (decoration for my main entry hall way). It was a lot harder to put together than I expected but I eventually figured it out. There is no drawer which is the only drawback (you don't realize how nice it is to have a table with a drawer in the hallway until you don't!) but overall I'm glad I bought this black table. With a little walmart mirror above it, a carpet underneath and a few decorations on top it makes the perfect entry way!
customer_reviews.author: LolaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Okay for the price
customer_reviews.text: Weird packaging, but arrived surprisingly intact, considering it came all the way from China. Basically particle board with extremely thin "veneer" of paint that scuffs easily. If I had the time I would put two or three coats of paint on it. For the price, it is adequate for my purpose. Sturdy and very easy assembly. Would be perfect if two inches higher. Took me about 30 minutes to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Super easy assembly . Just a tip though put the wood pieces in with only the black pieces in THEN slide the silver things in and twist otherwise you’ll be wondering why it won’t lay flat . I’ve never built anything in my life and put this thing together by myself in less then 30 minutes so idk why people are saying the instructions are bad and it was hard to build. It was super easy my dogs could do it
customer_reviews.author: Cierra Swinton

customer_reviews.title: Cheap material, comes damaged.
customer_reviews.text: Not as expected at all. The product was damaged, small nicks and dents everywhere on the "wood" which scraped off the paint. Weird stains and bad paint job. It really hurts because the instruction asks you to put glue on so secure the assembly and now I won't get it apart. Very disappointed. it's a lot shorter and wider than expected and it just doesn't fit at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie D.

customer_reviews.title: Very minimalistic, love the way it looks
customer_reviews.text: This table was great for my entryway. I have it right behind my door (just the way that my apartment is designed) and it’s great for setting things like my keys, mail and small plants. I accidentally overwatered one of my plants and didn’t check to see that the excess water had drained onto my table and thus a small part of the corner is slightly swollen now ): ...so just something to pay attention to: don’t let it get wet lol.
customer_reviews.author: Mae

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value for the money- beats IKEA!
customer_reviews.text: The gray color is just dark enough for what u was looking for and the faux wood grains bring in some dimension. Definitely sturdy enough for my purposes and for someone who hates directions, I could easily assemble within 15 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Angeleno

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Computer Desk
customer_reviews.text: Did not come with an instruction book and had a couple good sized dingers in it. But otherwise a nice looking computer desk for my boys room. Even without the instructions and having just enough experience as a 35 year old woman putting stuff together I got this together in 15 minutes. 4 stars just because no instruction book and the dingers.
customer_reviews.author: Jenni

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: We use this for our entry way. It's beautiful and has a shiny finish to it. It was very simple to put together, though I recommend having at least 2 people do it as some of the screws are tough to get in unless someone is pushing the boards into one another. It isn't the highest quality item but its appearance could say otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Scott C. Funderburk

customer_reviews.title: Great for more space
customer_reviews.text: I assembled this myself while watching Netflix and drinking coffee on a Sunday and it was very easy. It did require a little balancing since I did it myself but not difficult. It matches my other while 9 cubical perfectly to allow my smaller house to hold more storage
customer_reviews.author: Maranda

customer_reviews.title: Simple but expensive
customer_reviews.text: It is a okay item. I needed to work from home, I don't have space for regular desk. It does its function. It looks clean and simple. Simple sometimes is better. The instructions were not specific but it was simply to figure up. It is expensive for what it is.
customer_reviews.author: Easter

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: the first delivery had a massive dent on the top board of the table so I gave it another shot and amazon sent me another one for free... looks good built, very pleased although this time the bottom part of the top panel board has a dent to.. thankfully this time it's not visible. I should give this table 3 stars for delivery quality but it looks nice and looks expensive. Worth the price but expect it to be delivered with some sort of damage!
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this Console for my daughter to use in her room as a vanity. This was a bad purchase choice. The product quality was not great, from the actual desk to the glue provided to put it together. The glue was all dried up so I had to run to the store and get some more glue. As I was putting the desk together I noticed that the corner of the desk had a big chip in it. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Nice, sleek modern design
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as an Amazon discounted open box item. Nothing was wrong with the packaging, all hardware was included and set up was easy. I have this in our entry way as soon as you walk in the door. Our shoe rack fits nicely underneath, and it has a great simple modern design about it. My only complaint is that it has now become a catch-all for everything as soon as you walk in the door ;)
customer_reviews.author: Irishminx

customer_reviews.title: Get it now!!! Wonderful product !!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I checked online several items and I just decided to buy this one fir the price !!! What a wonderful feeling when we assembled it !!!!! Just perfect! Excellent quality, size and design!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for a vanity
customer_reviews.text: I finally was able to clear out an area for myself to put my makeup and such. I am outnumbered, hubby and 2 boys. Love that I was able to set it up myself and it is sturdy. Only draw back I missed in reviews is the height. I still need to buy the lifts for it, other than that better that I was hoping.
customer_reviews.author: Boymomma

customer_reviews.title: Great Looking veneer finish, heavily built
customer_reviews.text: There are lots of different 'cherry' colors out there, somehow this matched really close to the rest of my professional office furniture's cherry. Lucky because you can never tell from pictures. styrofoam crumbles particularly easily, be ready to vacuum it when unpacking.
customer_reviews.author: josh

customer_reviews.title: Broken pieces, horrible instructions.
customer_reviews.text: First, there were about 4 chips in the finish, and they were not small chips. Then we noticed one end was smashed and you could see the particle board beneath. The instructions are not very helpful either with the pictures not having enough detail. I have put together a lot of furniture, but between all of the quality issues and poor instructions, we decided to go with a different table.
customer_reviews.author: Jaclyn

customer_reviews.title: I don't suggest it unless you can get a discount damage $ return if you have the same problems and different packing material.
customer_reviews.text: I like what it appears to be in the picture. I do NOT like the fact that I need it now so I don't have time to make a return due to damage (a small chunk out of the pressed board). I do NOT like the fact that the packing material- was styrofoaml. Almost all of it was broken in small pieces which makes for a lot of tiny pieces all over my carpet and stuck to every surface of the pressed board. It's a nightmare.
customer_reviews.author: LVA

customer_reviews.title: Nice table for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Very decent table. Pretty much compressed particle board but very sturdy. No issues with assembly. Some directions not too clean As to then upside and downside is support pieces but You can figure it out the the holes go up and inside. I got 2 of these. One for the kitchen area and another for kids as a “study desk”
customer_reviews.author: LMZ

customer_reviews.title: Good shape, easy to assemble, very cheap material
customer_reviews.text: First thing to notice is the material is very cheap particle board. The wood veneer is thin and a bit shiny like plastic. One of the boards had a hole punched into it (on the underside so I rolled with it and didn’t do a return). Easy to assemble and it’s a pretty nice size for a hall or wall side table.
customer_reviews.author: LHSF

customer_reviews.title: Desk
customer_reviews.text: I was so disappointed this item was so cute but after a year it completely broke it does not like having heavy thing on top so ladies if your thinking about buying this to be used as a "vanity" I wouldn't recommend putting so many items on the top it will start to jobble.
customer_reviews.author: Armando

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I definitely wasn’t expecting much after reading the reviews. However, I love it and it was SOOO easy to assemble! I am short so the height didn’t bother me but I wanted to try the bed raiser idea anyway. I love it higher and the raisers were only $7.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Looks as pictured
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I was looking for in a smaller sized desk. The only thing I would recommend is that to properly put this together you would need two people. I was putting this together on my own and because of this I wasn’t able to properly get all the screws in the way the instructions suggested. But I was able to make it work.
customer_reviews.author: christine g.

customer_reviews.title: Great, Affordable Console Table
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice looking table. We needed something to put in our living room to fill up some space and decorate. This was perfect for what we needed although it is a bit smaller than I was expecting. This was purchased on a lightning deal at a good price. Assembly was a breeze, it took about 10 minutes. I would recommend this for someone who is looking for a inexpensive console table.
customer_reviews.author: A. fifield

customer_reviews.title: 0 stars
customer_reviews.text: If I could give 0 stars I would. The table came damaged. It was very clear that someone had tried to assemble the table, decided against it, and returned it. There were dowels in some of the holes despite no dowels being in the pack of screws. Also no instructions came with the table. Absolutely trash. Don’t bother.
customer_reviews.author: Alexa Marcelle

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend to my friends
customer_reviews.text: I got two of these for my bedroom. One is used as a vanity and the other has my jewelry. The first was tricky to assemble the second one was a lot easier. They are very sturdy. There is a subtle wood grain texture that makes it look and feel nice.
customer_reviews.author: Bridget

customer_reviews.title: Nice but unstable
customer_reviews.text: It’s a very nicely, very light piece to accentuate a low traffic area of your home. It looks very nice but it’s too unstable, especially for a house with kids!!
customer_reviews.author: Ximena E.

customer_reviews.title: Functional and
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the price- we added two of these behind our sofa to put drinks and items on to reduce a need for a coffee table and these work great. I added coasters because I was worried drinks would ruin the top but guests have put drinks on them with no coaster and they held up just fine, but I still would recommend a tray or coasters for drinks. I would give 4 stars if you plan on moving the furniture, as I suspect it would not do well if moved often.
customer_reviews.author: Meggie

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I DID NOT HAVE TO MAKE IT HIGHER! It was fine because I got a low stool seat for it and used it as a vanity it’s beautiful
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: EASY ASSEMBLY
customer_reviews.text: I love that it is exactly as described. I needed that specific size and it works nicely. It was easy to assemble once you get the hang of the little locking caps. Quite sturdy and looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Rae Lynn Hilliard

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy! Get it!!
customer_reviews.text: I use it for a home dj set up - two turntables and one mixer, and have a great amount space leftover in length. There isn't much depth area for this set up, but up against a wall, it gets the job done. I appreciate the space it takes in my room. The quality is great for the price, and it's an easy build.
customer_reviews.author: Diyanna

customer_reviews.title: Furniture that’s not crap!
customer_reviews.text: We have bought furniture from Target, Walmart, and Amazon. We have had are fair share of cheap crap. This took 10 mins to put together, light weight, study AF. It looks great! We are surprised for it being an amazon product! We bought the Black one. We love it. It’s a little short to be a desk but we love it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. This table is made very cheaply. The table had damage when taken out of the box. The box was not damaged. I would not set anything on it that is to heavy as it will not hold. The table is made of partical board and the top is hollow. The damage that was on the table was a big hole.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Not the best material but great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Had several damaged pieces. Contacted customer service. They were willing to send replacement pieces, every piece was damaged and I just did not want to go through the hassle. All hardware was there. Was easy to assemble, just ugly from the damage.
customer_reviews.author: K. Fargo

customer_reviews.title: Great table!!
customer_reviews.text: Good table depending on what you want it for! I ordered this to use for a vanity I was putting together in my room, it worked out great! But if you're looking for a high-quality looking table that's very sturdy this is probably not for you. I ordered black but it's more of a chocolate brown.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Horribly Engineered
customer_reviews.text: So during the installation I came across several issues which turned what could have been a 15 minute assembly to 45 minutes to an hour, and the table is still not properly assembled. One of the pieces did not have the holes correctly manufactured and there was trouble getting the cams to lock down on the bolts, so right now the table top can be lifted up at any time. Two stars are for price & the fact that it is not properly assembled that it aesthetically looks properly assmebled.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby G.

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Loveeeeee it! Took a while to get here but was well worth the wait. Enough space to use as an laptop desk. Although, you may not have enough room to write comfortably with the laptop and desk lamp on the surface at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Not very sturdy but looks nice.
customer_reviews.text: Looks very nice. I bought this with intentions to use as a desk/vanity and it does the trick. Very easy to assemble - took about 15-20 minutes. Was super scared that it was gonna have dents or scratches but it came in flawless. One thing I do have to say is that it’s not very sturdy; it tips easily if you lean it side to side.
customer_reviews.author: EX

customer_reviews.title: Easiest thing I’ve seen my husband build
customer_reviews.text: Literally the easiest thing I’ve ever watched my husband build 😂 5 pieces, 3 steps, 30 mins and it was done. It’s perfect!!! We put it behind our couch with a couple 18 in stools and it’s got a bar type feel. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Travon

customer_reviews.title: I love it! I ordered this not for its purpose ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I ordered this not for its purpose as a console table but it's the only table that fits the bill and dimension. I use it as a digital piano stand (lol). Did not expect it to be as stylish as displayed but IT IS and is very sturdy!! Its appearance is high quality. The wood is very light! I'm 100lbs and can pick it up myself easily. Very simple to assemble. Took me about 20 mins (probably less than that). Can be done by one person. I plan to use it as a console table in the future because it looks great!
customer_reviews.author: NewUser

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality control
customer_reviews.text: Package did not arrive in original packaging, it was clearly a resell which is fine except when I went to assemble the table together, the screws were all missing and there was a strange manual left inside this package from previous owner. Also, the table had a dent on the top corner, was disappointed in this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: W. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and easy to put together!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful and so easy to put together. Made very well! I was able to put it together myself. Happy I bought three to line my hallway. Great for storage and space saving!
customer_reviews.author: Robs💙

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for a 55” TV that will be used in my office as a display monitor. So easy to put together and very nice looking when complete. Would buy this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Madonna Burton

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product, came damaged, list goes on
customer_reviews.text: Nothing positive. Box looked like it was hammered, the product was hammered, the screws and cam locks were spinning all the way and didnt line up when I decided to ignore the damage as it would almost be hidden from sight. Piece of junk wouldn't go together and I've put probably a hundred of these together. Also I ordered prime and it took a week instead of a day or two. Just the whole thing. Feel I should be provided an inconvenience fee or credit for the inconvenience honestly. What a waste of time money and energy.
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: awesome little (big) table!!
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was gonna be cheap material and it was surprisingly not for covered particle board....it was 5 pieces and extremely easy to put together. perfect for what i wanted it for (i have a new sectional and no room for end tables and used this between the wall and my sectional for a place to set drinks remotes etc) when i put it together it was VERY sturdy. only thing that stopped me from giving it 5 stars is that it did not come with floor protectors on the leg bottoms. so you will need to go buy some at the store if you care about scratching your hardwoods.
customer_reviews.author: andrea morrow

customer_reviews.title: Pieces missing or wrong
customer_reviews.text: Came slightly damaged. Pieces were missing for hardware and what did come were damaged screws. Too much hassle to return it so we used our own screws to put it together. Looks fine now but what a pain
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my space
customer_reviews.text: I have a bathtub room that was missing a vanity and this was the perfect fit for the space. The size and look was just right. Also it was very easy to assemble. I was able to do it on my own.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Allen

customer_reviews.title: Cute and functional
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something to put in my classroom where I could put my trays so the kids could turn in their work as they headed out the door so I bought this. I’m so happy with it! It’s so cute, has a great color and it does exactly what I needed it to. I would definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: K. Engle

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: This has been the worst product I ever received and ordered!!! Wood is fake and very cheaply designed! A lot of the screws scripted from me just turning them lightly !!! Opened box and almost all pieces were cracked or had dents and holes! The only reason I’m not returning is because it’s not worth the hassle and it’s only temporary!
customer_reviews.author: Latisha Coates

customer_reviews.title: Horribly measured for assembly
customer_reviews.text: Got the product with no damage it seemed all well constructed and nice finish on the wood. Until I started assembling the product was when it was bad. The pieces that lock onto the screw heads were not able to lock due to imprecise screw measurements and holes which led to frustration and confusion and so it caused me to assemble the boards backwards with the glue. Never will buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Brent

customer_reviews.title: Great buy. Easy setup.
customer_reviews.text: Simply put, I'm the type of person who considers paying extra to move in fully furnished homes just to avoid ever putting ANYTHING together. This was simple. Took me under 20 minutes, looked chic & was very sturdy! Good enough for me.
customer_reviews.author: Crown Reviews On YouTube

customer_reviews.title: Multiple uses great price
customer_reviews.text: I got this item, put it together in less than 30 minutes, and it is very sturdy. I'm using it for an ill advised purpose (fairly heavy 6 year old 47" TV). It holds the TV with no problems, no wobbling looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Karcher

customer_reviews.title: Top came scratched.
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for! This is really low to the floor! fine for a kids room but not for an adult. Top came with a scratch, too much of a hassle to return. You’ll get just a small plain table. Pros: easy to assemble
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They really look great, very durable and very easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 of these consoles. They really look great, very durable and very easy to put together. It probably took me less than an hour to put both of them together all by my self. they are very lightweight once they are out of the box. I have had these for almost 6 months and I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Luna Melesio

customer_reviews.title: A pleasure to place by the living room window .
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble , pieces weighty - which is a good thing. We have our electronic keyboard sitting on top , facing the living room windows , and trees on our front lawn . Very inexpensive . A success .
customer_reviews.author: Phil Silverman

customer_reviews.title: Huff and puff and blow this ish down
customer_reviews.text: This thing is so cheaply made. The corners are supposed to be glued. They actually give you glue! The first time I picked this up to move, it fell apart! I’m sooo disappointed! It looks beautiful sitting there though! just hope no wind comes thru my house!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kristie Destin

customer_reviews.title: Very worth it for the price
customer_reviews.text: this table is beautiful and easy to assemble. It can be used as a desk or just for decorating purposes too. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: denisse

customer_reviews.title: Nice inexpensive side table for accent purposes
customer_reviews.text: Nice simple clean design that matched my dining room table at an affordable price. Went together easily with no problems or fuss. I would not want to trust a heavy load on the table, but for my purposes with a few items on display, it is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur R.

customer_reviews.title: pretty good
customer_reviews.text: I think this is a great deal for the price. Super easy to put together (10 minutes). Nice finish. I use it in my office, adjacent my actual desk to keep printers, files, scanner, and the wifi router. Tall enough to store some stuff underneath as well.
customer_reviews.author: ApachoLikeWhoa

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality, very wobbly
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely terrible quality. And you don't find out until after you out it together. It's very wobbly and the wood is very cheap. Very dissatisfied and I can't even return it because it was so hard putting together I am not taking it apart
customer_reviews.author: Mari Mejia

customer_reviews.title: It has stood the test of time. I purchased it many years ago
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this table 5 years ago. This is it today. With stuff just thrown on it lol. It just happened to pop up and ask for a review. The table is sturdy and looks pretty good. It has stood the test of time considering I paid maybe $60 for it at the time.
customer_reviews.author: Nicety

customer_reviews.title: Makes an awesome vanity set
customer_reviews.text: My daughter uses for a makeup table. The top is just the right size. The only problem we have is that it is a little shorter than needed for her to slide under it. We bought it along with a white swivel task chair. Makes an awesome vanity set.
customer_reviews.author: NoFunHunAZ

customer_reviews.title: Value you for money
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical about ordering this desk as it seemed a little cheap looking but I was wrong! This desk was so easy to put together and overall feels really sturdy and great material. I love how it came out and would totally recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Katherin

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and great for a vanity
customer_reviews.text: Great product for a great price, you won't be disappointed!! I'm a 31 yr old female, 5'1 and assembled this in 30mins. My only tip is to take it slow and easy, don't force any screws. So happy with this.
customer_reviews.author: Hub/wife

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful modern desk
customer_reviews.text: This desk has a great value. Sturdy, real painted wood look, and very clean/modern looking. I put the long panel towards the front and a mirror to hide wires from incoming house guests!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Bradbury

customer_reviews.title: Update
customer_reviews.text: THANK YOU!!, Customer Support. I received part #3 just a couple of days post review and I couldn't be happier. Its a nice table. It looks good and suits my needs. In short, Id say they provided excellent customer service.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Purchased it for small room and to match with another piece of furniture i have. looks great and good quality for price
customer_reviews.author: BBW2

customer_reviews.title: So easy to assemble.  Great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I assembled it by myself which would have taken about 30 minutes except I was missing two small round metal parts. I requested them from the manufacturer via email and I got them in about a week since I am in Hawaii, probably would have arrived in two days in the mainland. The table sits perfectly in my entrance hall to catch keys, hats, bags, etc. So happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: M C.

product_meta.title: Convenience Concepts Northfield Hall Console Table, Espresso
product_meta.description: Color:EspressoThe modern design of the Northfield line will complete the look of the contemporary home. The 111091 Wall Console table is perfect for entry ways and living rooms. Convenience Concepts brings you exciting and affordable furniture. Combining exciting designs with economical overseas manufacturing to bring you the finest in sensible contemporary furniture. Focusing on R-T-A Entertainment, TV, Storage, and Accent furniture.
feature_bullets: Great to use in hallways and living rooms

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars1,487 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
